4307980.name: Galactic Rumble
4307980.description:
Enter the Arena and battle enemy targets in a fast-paced action game that blends casual game-play with high-intensity moments. Ram into enemy targets to earn points and unlock the cage holding the hologram key to escape.

Use power-ups to take down targets more efficiently, including a laser cannon and a force field. Choose your strategy and adapt as the challenge increases before the timer runs out.

BEWARE the Hunter Ship as it will actively lark outside the arena waiting for you to wander to far off.
4307980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
